title: Proposal: Non-Financial Metric Integration and Agent Testing Suite

reasoning.problem: Proposal: Development of a Non-Financial Metric Integration Module and Rigorous Agent Testing Suite. This addresses the Status Update regarding removal of financial-only constraints, and Evolutionary Axiom 2026-01-15 regarding AgentGladiator instability. The module will ingest and analyze data related to ethical implications, societal impact, and technological advancements. The testing suite will implement automated pre-deployment validation for all agents, preventing continuous failures in the operational environment. Prioritize Axiom 2026-01-15's testing requirements. A further audit to recover past 'Scars' and learn from past mistakes would also be beneficial, once capacity is increased.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
